summaries: This document is a Form 10-K report filed by Oracle Corporation, a Delaware company with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The report covers the fiscal year ended on May 31, 2025. Oracle Corporation's common stock and senior notes are registered under Section 12(b) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and are traded on the New York Stock Exchange. The company is classified as a large accelerated filer and has filed all required reports for the preceding 12 months. Oracle Corporation has also complied with Rule 405 of Regulation S-T by submitting all Interactive Data Files electronically during the past 12 months. Furthermore, the registrant's management has attested to the effectiveness of its internal control over financial reporting under Section 404(b) of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act. The aggregate market value of voting stock held by non-affiliates was $305,793,119,000 as of May 31, 2025, based on the closing sale price of common stock as reported by the New York Stock Exchange on November 29, 2024. The number of shares of common stock outstanding as of June 13, 2025, is 2,808,833,000. Portions of Oracle Corporation's definitive proxy statement relating to its 2025 annual meeting of stockholders have been incorporated by reference into Part III of this Annual Report on Form 10-K. The complete proxy statement will be filed with the SEC within 120 days of the registrant’s fiscal year ended May 31, 2025.
